Text: Nothing wrong with this music except it is NOT acoustic. I do not know what you definition of acoustic is but it's usually one instrument like just a piano or guitar being played and not so much bass or drums. Usually NO bass or drums. Good torrent but list it correctly please.
correction, "Whataya want from me" is the only acoustic song on this list.

@blacklion21 - Acoustic Live! is the first extended play (EP) by American singer Adam Lambert, released on December 6, 2010. The EP features acoustic versions of four songs from Lambert's debut album, For Your Entertainment, as well as his show-stopping "Mad World" rendition.

@smysam - Thank you.
